title: Systems Software Engineer, Platform Architecture
summary: Imagine what you can do here. At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job, and there’s no telling what we can accomplish together.
description: Apple’s Platform Architecture group is seeking a systems engineer to build high performance functional models of advanced SoC designs and to help bridge the gap between Software and Hardware, influencing performance improvements, power efficiency, security, and the programming ease of Apple products.
key_qualifications: Background in low-level software, operating systems, or compilers. Excellent programming (C++/C) and scripting skills (Python). Assembly experience a plus. Proficiency with debugging large, complex system software. Experience with kernel, driver, and firmware development a plus. Experience with modeling and simulation a plus. Knowledge of ARM and/or X86 architectures a plus.
education_experience: BS with 3+ years experience. Degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering preferred
